def max_points_from_cards(n, cards):
    sorted_cards = [(b, a) for (a, b) in cards]
    sorted_cards.sort(reverse=True)
    counter = 2
    points = 0
    i = 0
    while counter > 0 and i < n:
        counter -= 1
        counter += sorted_cards[i][0]
        points += sorted_cards[i][1]
        i += 1
    return points
